transcripts.text: world leaders caught on camera laughing about president trump.  several world leaders mocking president trump.
my administration has accomplished more than almost any administration in the history of our country.  Didn't expect that reaction, but that's okay.
World leaders mocking and ridiculing him for being completely off balance.
Allies are deeply worried about him.  They say he's becoming increasingly isolated.  Something is very wrong.

The world sees Trump for what he is, insincere, ill-informed, corrupt, dangerously incompetent, and incapable, in my view, of world leadership.  And if we give Donald Trump four more years, we'll have a great deal of difficulty if ever being able to recover America's standing in the world in our capacity to bring nations together.
